Welcome the Expected.Request's documentation!

Expected.Request, a simple API testing framework.

View the Project on GitHub

  • Home
  • Request
  • ExpectRequest
  • DoneRequest

    • Method

    Task<IExpectRequest> Delete(string url);

    Used to make a Delete request to the URL specified.

    Example

    await new Request()
    .Delete("http://localhost:8080/api/todo/1")
    .Done();

    Back to Request
